A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There are so many things wrong with this movie I don't know where to start. Just search YouTube for on of hundreds of videos discussing all the mistakes\, nonsense\, and lost opportunities. Disney has officially destroyed the Star Wars franchise. As for all the FAKE positive reviews by the \"Critics\"\, it shows how deceitful and money hungry Disney has become in their attempt to squeeze as much juice out of this lemon before it's completely rotten.
